name: CategoryTheory.NormalMono.w
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
X Y : C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
self : CategoryTheory.NormalMono f
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f CategoryTheory.NormalMono.g) 0
decl:
/-- A normal monomorphism is a morphism which is the kernel of some morphism. -/
class NormalMono (f : X ⟶ Y) where
  Z : C -- Porting note: violates naming convention but can't think of a better one
  g : Y ⟶ Z
  w : f ≫ g = 0
  isLimit : IsLimit (KernelFork.ofι f w)

name: CategoryTheory.IsNormalMonoCategory.normalMonoOfMono
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
self : CategoryTheory.IsNormalMonoCategory C
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Mono f
⊢ Nonempty (CategoryTheory.NormalMono f)
decl:
/-- A normal mono category is a category in which every monomorphism is normal. -/
class IsNormalMonoCategory : Prop where
  normalMonoOfMono : ∀ {X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ Y) [Mono f], Nonempty (NormalMono f)

name: CategoryTheory.regularMonoCategoryOfNormalMonoCategory
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsNormalMonoCategory C
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsRegularMonoCategory C
decl:
instance (priority := 100) regularMonoCategoryOfNormalMonoCategory [IsNormalMonoCategory C] :
    IsRegularMonoCategory C where
  regularMonoOfMono f _ := ⟨by
    haveI := normalMonoOfMono f
    infer_instance⟩

name: CategoryTheory.NormalEpi.w
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
X Y : C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
self : CategoryTheory.NormalEpi f
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.NormalEpi.g f) 0
decl:
/-- A normal epimorphism is a morphism which is the cokernel of some morphism. -/
class NormalEpi (f : X ⟶ Y) where
  W : C
  g : W ⟶ X
  w : g ≫ f = 0
  isColimit : IsColimit (CokernelCofork.ofπ f w)

name: CategoryTheory.IsNormalEpiCategory.normalEpiOfEpi
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
self : CategoryTheory.IsNormalEpiCategory C
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Epi f
⊢ Nonempty (CategoryTheory.NormalEpi f)
decl:
/-- A normal epi category is a category in which every epimorphism is normal. -/
class IsNormalEpiCategory : Prop where
  normalEpiOfEpi : ∀ {X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ Y) [Epi f], Nonempty (NormalEpi f)

name: CategoryTheory.regularEpiCategoryOfNormalEpiCategory
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsNormalEpiCategory C
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsRegularEpiCategory C
decl:
instance (priority := 100) regularEpiCategoryOfNormalEpiCategory [IsNormalEpiCategory C] :
    IsRegularEpiCategory C where
  regularEpiOfEpi f _ := ⟨by
    haveI := normalEpiOfEpi f
    infer_instance⟩
